entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
